Class Item

    • common.model.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    One item of the tool shop application

    1.0

            int itemSupplierID)
        creates an Item with specified parameters
        Parameters:
        itemID - corresponds to data field toolIDNumber
        itemName - corresponds to data field toolName
        itemQuantity - corresponds to data field quantity
        itemPrice - corresponds to data field price
        itemSupplierID - corresponds to a certain supplier
